name: Alice Springs Chicken
ingredients: Seasonings of your choice (e.g., Spicy Seasoning Salt)

instructions.en: Season the chicken breasts with your choice of seasonings.
Grill the chicken until just done. Keep warm.
In a skillet, fry the bacon until crisp. Drain on paper towels.
In the same skillet, saut√© the mushrooms and garlic in butter. Season with salt to taste. Cook until juices have evaporated.
Place the grilled chicken on a foil-lined baking sheet.
Top each piece of chicken with 1/4 of the mushrooms and bacon, then with the shredded cheese.
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly.

notes: This recipe makes 4 servings. The author thinks this could be frozen.
